name: SENKAI RULES!
description:
IMPORTANT! Interact with NPCs with spacebar and dont move until dialogs end :)

Explore the world and challenge your enemies with your trusty rulers in SENKAI RULES! but remember, if the battle rules are not followed your adventure may be cut short...

CONTROLS

WASD for movement and A & D to move through menus. SPACE to interact.

ATTACKS
  • RULER: Damages a single enemy
  • PROTRACTOR: Poisons a single enemy
  • SQUARE AND BEVEL: Damages all the enemies

Also, you can dodge attacks if you press the spacebar at the right time!

ITEMS
  • ERASER: Lets the player deliver a killing blow next turn
  • GLUE: Raises player defense for three turns
  • SHARPENER: Raises player attack for three turns

Try to fight all the enemies and reach the end! 

Made for GameGen Game Jam 2
